Scene:
The Sushi Shop
(Sushiya / すしや)

Play: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees (義経千本桜)

Production: May 1970

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Mojitayū IX (see also Takemoto Sumitayū VII) (竹本文字大夫 (九))

Toyotake Tokutayū (豊竹十九大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kinshi IV (野澤錦糸 (四))

Takezawa Yashichi X (竹澤弥七 (十))
